title: PVP kernal patcher  not working
body: When ever I try and launch League I get thus message what does it mean, also I can't play the game

replies.body: If TechnoFlame's instructions don't fix it, could you please tell us what OS you are on and what your ISP is?
His instructions did fix it sorry for the delay
No problem man. Glad that it worked!
Happens a lot, open in admin mode, should work
